divs: Sighting DetailsObject was silent overhead, bright white light... No flashing, and no other lights, and traveled faster than a plane or jet, it remained in view, and as it got farther away, it dimmed quicker than expected, like it got faster... Yesterday I saw a white light that at first I thought was a falling star, as it appeared to fly downward, then turned sharply 90 degrees and shot away and dissappeared. Sighting 2 nights in a row!!
